sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Poop</radical> <radical>Poop</radical> <radical>Mountain</radical> is covered in poop because it is such a <kanji>secluded</kanji> place.
meaningInfo: A secluded place has no toilets, so you just poop right on the mountain.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>secluded</kanji> Poop Poop Mountain is a favorite of <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>). They go there to get away from their phones to get in touch with nature again.
readingInfo: Imagine hundreds of youths on this secluded mountain, all pooping on the ground while trying to get a cell phone signal.
